nodes.text: Lynos IV was a terrestrial astronomical object. Han Solo and Chewbacca once had an incident on Lynos IV that involved Zefin Tuzo, the manager of a resort on Marquinn. The incident led Tuzo to despise the two smugglers, and she later worked with the gangster Vullen Candroon to lead them into a trap.
Lynos IV was first mentioned in "Chewie's Day Off," written by John Barber and published as the lead story of the canon comic book Star Wars Adventures 14, released on September 26, 2018.
